articles.content: The West Texas Intermediate Crude Oil market has shown itself to be resilient, but not necessarily ready to break out. There is a complete disconnect between those who are looking at a post coronavir… [+586 chars]

articles.title: Zomato to charge zero commission on takeaway service from restaurants - Mint
articles.description: Zomato announced that it will not be charging any commission, and will also forego the payment gateway charges that the company incur on all takeaway orders
